epfl.sweng.backend

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.sweng.backend.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure of a question for the quiz application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor without identity nor owner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(long id,
        java.lang.String content,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> answers,
        int solutionIndex,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags,
        java.lang.String owner)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier of the question
        content - Text body of the question
        answers - List of all possible answers. The list is 0-indexed, meaning that the first element's index is 0. The order matters, because the correct one is identified by its index.
        solutionIndex - Correct answer index in the answers list.
        tags - Set of question tags.
        owner - Question owner.

      • Question

        public Question(java.lang.String content,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> answers,
        int solutionIndex,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags)
        Constructor without identity nor owner.
        Parameters:
        content - Text body of the question
        answers - List of all possible answers. The list is 0-indexed, meaning that the first element's index is 0. The order matters, because the correct one is identified by its index.
        solutionIndex - Correct answer index in the answers list.
        tags - Set of question tags.
